item.description:
We'll be doing a "collage-a-thon," which simply means making as many ATCs as you can during the course of the Meetup. We'll also be doing a couple of special projects--watch your e-mail for information about that.

Themes: #1--Alphabet--one letter, several or all; #2--Artist's choice (we didn't have a technique demo in October, so we'll just open it up this time).

If you can show up by 12:45 to help set up, that would be extremely helpful. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: All Saints Room. Enter through door at far back end of parking lot; proceed down hall to All Saints Room

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: November 2011 NE ATC+ Monthly Meetup
